document_data.name: ''Mantle of Kossuth''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mantles of Kossuth''''' were a type of traditional [[enchanted]] garb worn by [[Kossuthan]] clergy and other powerful worshipers of the Lord of Flames.
document_data.Description: These [[cloak]]s were brilliant red in color and adorned in designs reminiscent of dancing flames.
document_data.Powers: ''Mantles of Kossuth'' gave the wearer resistance to mundane and magical flames.
document_data.History: These items were in use by the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. One of the ''mantles of Kossuth'' was a part of [[Mintassan's Mysteries]]'s collection of curious in the city of [[Westgate]]. The planeswalking [[wizard]] was offering the cloak for sale as of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}.
